caption.title: Detection of WNV-RNA and infectious virus in feather pulps.
caption.p: WNV-RNA titers (represented as genome equivalents per milliliter, upper panel) and infectious virus (represented as pfu/ml, lower panel) in feather pulps of birds infected with WNV-Lineage 1 or WNV-Lineage 2 at different time post infection. Dashed line represents limit of detection of the qRT-PCR assay.
